subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar and Gary Woodland ended the United States’ 11-year drought in the World Cup by shooting a five-under-par 67 to win by two strokes in Hainan, China.
snippet: Matt Kuchar and Gary Woodland ended the United States’ 11-year drought in the World Cup by shooting a five-under-par 67 to win by two strokes in Hainan, China.
